channel.title: [mp_forceautoteam] Cvar not working on Dedicated server
channel.description:
Since mp_forceautoteam is a cvar, it would be expected that it would work on servers, but it doesn't. it only seems to function properly on the client. I don't know if this was taken out or just wasn't attended to properly.
The first instance is the client, then the server executing the same command.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/a1QYS0g.png[/img]
I am running the Windows version of the Black Mesa dedicated server.
